titles.title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 450 Lexington Avenue in New York, New York, as the "Vincent R. Sombrotto Post Office".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 6/6/2013--Introduced. Designates the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 450 Lexington Avenue in New York, New York, as the "Vincent R. Sombrotto Post Office."
